title: 110_s319
content: The Act titled "Reducing the Incentives to Guzzle Gas Act" includes heavy vehicles in the limitation on depreciation of certain luxury automobiles. The Act "Reducing the Incentives to Guzzle Gas Act" amends the Internal Revenue Code to redefine passenger automobiles based on weight ratings, with an exception for vehicles used in farming business. The Act redefines passenger automobiles based on weight ratings, with an exception for vehicles used in farming business. The amendments apply to property placed in service after the enactment date of the Act. The amendments made by this section apply to property placed in service after the enactment of this Act. SEC. 4. EXPENSING LIMITATION FOR FARM VEHICLES. Amends section 179(b) of the Internal Revenue Code to limit the cost of farm vehicles that can be taken into account to $30,000 for any taxable year. Effective for property placed in service after the enactment of this Act.
